title: Technology Governance
prompt: A rural clinic waiting room bathed in soft afternoon light filtering through large windows, with a weathered wooden table in the foreground holding scattered medical charts and a tablet device side-by-side, suggesting the collision of analog and digital care systems; an elderly patient's hands visible at the edge of the frame as they reach toward both paper and screen, with soft shadows and warm amber tones emphasizing the tension between traditional healthcare and emerging technology in a modest, understaffed rural medical space.
